level.heading: CERTIFICATION REQUIREMENTS; APPLICATION FOR CERTIFICATION (ยง 17-9304)

level.text: Except as otherwise provided in this chapter, a person applying for certification as a home health aide shall:
Be at least eighteen (18) years of age;
Submit evidence of having successfully completed an approved home health aide program;
Pass a Board approved certification examination;
Submit an application and application fee.
A certified nursing assistant (CNA) applying for certification as an HHA shall:
Provide evidence of having successfully completed the training requirements specific to the role of an HHA as specified in ยง 9327;
Submit an application and application fee.
